meanings.definition: To have a common origin or source
meanings.sent1: The two rivers coderives from the same mountain.
meanings.sent2: The siblings coderives their love for music from their parents.
meanings.sent3: The idea that cats and dogs coderives from aliens is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship coderives from a shared passion for adventure.
meanings.sent5: The ancient legend coderives the power of the sun from a mystical crystal.

meanings.definition: To originate or come from the same source
meanings.sent1: The different languages coderives from a common ancient language.
meanings.sent2: The various dishes coderives from traditional family recipes.
meanings.sent3: The rumor that unicorns and rainbows coderives from the same magical land is funny.
meanings.sent4: Their success coderives from hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful melody coderives its inspiration from the sounds of nature.
